name: Station Eleos
description:
Station Eleos is a 2D Interactive Narrative Story in wich you play Inspector Sullyvan.

A murder has been committed on the Station Eleos. Follow The inspector Sullyvan in his adventure, interact with people and learn the truth.

Made in 1 week.

Music / Sound Design /Dev / Scenarist : Thomas TANNEAU

Environnement Art / Generalist 3D : Arthur AGENEAU 

Art Lead / Character Artist / Scenarist : Maxime MICHON (Weirddreamer)

Generalist 3D / UI : Baptiste MOREAU (BAIM)
